113.content:
You begin to awaken early in the morning, your head was spinning and your throat was dehydrated. You look over to see that someone was with you in bed. You couldn't tell who it was but from the faint outline you could make out that I was a women. You scratch your head and then crack your neck as you get up from the bed and head to the bathroom. You step inside, feeling the texture of the bathroom tiles as you walk forward and up to the sink. You look into the mirror and see your usual face, your hair was a mess and you needed a trim.

"Mmm...hey where'd you go?" you heard the woman on your bed mutter. You look back to see her leaning upward, her chest covered with a blanket. You walk out of the bathroom and walk towards the bed.

"Morning." you say before letting out a yawn.

"Mmm...what time is it?" the woman yawns. You look at the alarm and look just in time to see it turn 5am.

"About 5am. You want anything?" you reply offering to grab the lady a drink.

"5am? Ugh I have to open the shop in an hour." the woman replies clearly having hadn't gotten enough sleep last night.

"Want me to wake you up in a half hour?" you offer and the woman nods.

"Thanks (your name). *yawn*" soon the woman falls back asleep and you nod.

"Sweet dreams...Ino"

...

Five minutes pass in the blink of an eye as you left of the bedroom and went into the kitchen to fix breakfast for the two of you. You set the table which didn't take long, you lived in a small apartment with only a few rooms, a kitchen/living room, a bathroom with a shower, and a bedroom. Regardless you were happy, especially since you had such nice and beautiful friends. You had several close friends, all of them women, all of them very beautiful looking, in fact it almost seemed like a harem in a way but you didn't mind. Some of the girls of your 'harem' were older than you some younger than you but age didn't matter.

You smile as you recall a memory from last night, you had received a call from Ino, she had called and asked you if you could help her study for her next exam. She was having a hard time getting down a jutsu and you agreed to help her. You and Ino spent several hours on trying to perfect the jutsu but at around 1am you called it a night. Ino asked if she could sleep in your bed tonight and you didn't see the harm in it.

"Mmmm *yawn* morning" Ino said as she finally woke up.

"Huh? Awake already? But I thought you were gonna sleep for another twenty minutes?" you asked as you put a large plate of riceballs on the table.

"{*yawn* I was but *yawn*..." Ino continued to yawn for another two minutes before continuing "...sorry. That jutsu really is a pain. I think I used up all my chakra last night."

"Makes sense." you say with a chuckle "you've been trying to get that jutsu of yours down for a while now. What was it called again? Mind something jutsu?"

"*ahem* its called the Mind transfer jutsu. And I've already got it mastered. I'm just trying to get it to the point where you can't break out of it!"

"Alright alright, you don't have to yell at me. Besides, you'll wake the neighbors" you groan before suddenly hearing a knock at the door. "hmm wonder who that could be?" You get up from the table and head to the door.

"Hello? Are you awake in there? I hope it's not too early" called the voice from outside. You make it ot the door and turn the handle to see none other than ____ standing on the porch.

choices: A Harem to Save the Future
1213.content:
My personal favorite series of Yugioh. Now how are you going to get your harem here? It is perfectly fine to throw the girls of the other Yugioh series into this, but you must first catch all the 5ds girls first and give a good reason for it.

Option #1: Slavery in New Domino: Remember my old original 5ds harem story? Well it's now back as the first option here but with a minor tweak. From any reason to Mega-Ultra Ebola®©™ causing wiping out a good chunk of the world because some NWO-types wanted to enact their devious plans but failed halfway, the Earthbound Immortals lashing out and cursing the world they failed to bring devastation to, the Three Pure Nobles/Z-ONE going back in time ending up making some few changes, or all of the above slavery is now in New Domino City to bump up birth rates. Women can now be auctioned off if they commit a crime, or if a boss/loved one/guardian signs a document stating they are to be sold. Slaves can also be won in duels between owners as well. Maybe you feel like being a hero and plan on rescuing the 5ds girls, or you just want them to yourself.

If you want to include that old serum from the original story that causes a girl's curves to grow two times their original size, makes them submissive to you and makes their holes eternally virginal tight, and lactate go right ahead.


Option #2: Psychic Conqueror: you are a psychic duelist who feels like testing his abilities out to gain a harem.

Option #3: A Harem for the Future: The android girl Misaki from the World Championship 2011 game is sent back in time to ensure you get a harem to save the world in the future. How the two of you go about this is up to you.

Option #4: Gift from the Duel Monsters Spirit World: like Luna you spent some time in the home of duel monsters spirits during your childhood. On one day you remember that time period, and how you received from a spirit that said it would help you to become very popular with the ladies. Time use it.

Option #5: Grim darkness of the far future there is only more choices. You ought to know this by now.
1213.title: 5Ds

12134.content:
Update: Decided to change the name.

Your name is Anon, a duelist of New Domino City, and you're currently dreaming of a world inhabited by duel monsters spirits. You never bought into that idea that Duel Monsters Spirit World exists, but yet every now and then you dream about the place you are certain does not exist. Strangely enough a younger version of yourself, no older than five at the least, is walking amongst the spirits generally having fun. This reoccurring dream is normally very short-lived and you can barely remember fragments of it most of the time. Tonight is different.

Tonight the dream is completely vivid and feels more like a memory. Almost as if you were actually in the spirit world at one point during your childhood.

"Come on, Anon. I have a gift for you back at my home." You hear a female spirit say to you. And there she was. The popular for obvious reasons Dark Magician Girl. The female Magician has served as your guide during your stay in this world, and the two of you had an absolute blast together. Your younger self wished you could have spent the rest of your days by her side.

The spirit took you by the hand and led you through a green field to her abode. Whoever built it couldn't have made it scream "wizards live here!" even if they used a spell to make the building grow a mouth. She later admitted that it wasn't actually her house, Dark Magican and Dark Sage were allowing her to stay until she finished her tutelage under them.

She brought you to a room filled with tomes which were assuredly magical in nature, and drew a symbol on the hand she held on the trip here.

"There all done! When you get older this will help you with the ladies, Anon." She assured you in a sweet voice accompanied by a smile which was betrayed by the devious glint in her eyes. Before you could question her the dreams ends, and you are wide awake to a very unsettling sight.

Your left hand is now on fire. You immediately begin panicking. You put your legs to good use as you rush to your bathroom in hopes that running water will be able to put this flame out. Had you been in a less frantic state you would have noticed the fire around you hand wasn't hurting earlier.

You hurried to the bathroom sink, wasting no time to turn turn the water on and to place your burning hand underneath it. After several minutes of this the fire refuses to go away much to your utter confusion. It's not really hurting you for some reason so what gives? To only as more to your confusion the fire's color changes into a dark blue with what appears to pink hearts surrounding it.

Did someone drug you without you noticing it?

"It's finally time for my gift to be used, Anon." You heard a voice say coming from the fire. You know that voice. It's the same one you heard from your dream. Soon the image of the Dark Magican Girl manifested in the fire.
12134.title: Spirit's gift

121341.content:
With a million questions all revolving around why your hand is on fire running through your mind you ask the image of the Dark Magican Girl one thing.

"Am I going crazy?"

She giggled. "No, silly! Don't you remember how all those years ago I gave you a gift?"

Wait, that time spent when you were a kid in the duel Monsters Spirit World actually happened? It's late at night, your hand is on fire, and a popular monster image is in the fire. You are probably insane, drugged up, or maybe this really is all happening. You're not certain which is preferable to be honest.

"Your gift is making my hand burn?" You bluntly ask the mage.

"Pfff. No. It's for helping you get a girlfriend, Anon." DMG replies, adding more to your confusion. "You just have to throw it-"

"How is burning women to death going to get me a girlfriend?"

"You were more polite when you were a kid, you know that?" Said an annoyed DMG. "It's a spell, Anon. Think of it like a love potion."

"That I have to throw in the shape of a fireball instead of tricking a girl to drink?"

"When you put it like that, yes," says the blonde mage, her smile returning. "I figured since we had so much fun together during your last trip here I ought to give you something to help you out later in life. Judging from your apartment I can say you needed it."

What the Dark Magican Girl failed to mention is she also gave you that spell because she was bored, and you liked the type who could give her some amusement down the road.

"It's only temporary until I can afford an actual house." You say rather defensively.

She rolled her eyes. "That's what they all say."

You decided you are probably going crazy. The Dark Magican Girl just insulted your apartment and is telling you to throw fireballs at women to make them want to be your girlfriend.

"So," you let out slowly, "How is this going to work when everyone can see the fire coming?"

"You really think I wouldn't have that planned out? The only person who can see it is you, Anon. I have you covered since your childhood." You then ask her what if you hit someone more than once with it, and a mischievous smirk emerged on her face. "Find out for yourself."

The fire goes out with her image and you return to bed to sleep on what has transpired. If all of that truly did happen you'll probably be the luckiest guy in the city. The next morning you learn you can call upon the fire af will. Nice to know it wasn't a drugs or a dream. You set out to find a girl to test this gift out on. Who do you run into?
121341.title: What's going on here?

121351.content:
Your traveling thru Egypt, in an expedition to look for some pharaoh’s tomb yet to be discovered. Unfortunately as your walking along you get swallowed up by the dunes and fall into a hidden chamber beneath the sands. Luckily your equipment is still good so you turn on your flashlight to look around as you notice writing on the wall but that isn’t what makes you stop.

1251.content:
You're a chunin of the Hidden Leaf Village on a mission. The mission in question was to search for an abandoned hideout of the late Toad Sage Jiyara. The Hokage recently found some research notes that belonged to the old man that caught her interest. She said it had something to do with an experimental Jutsu that she wanted to try out. You made a joke about it being some sort of age reversal Jutsu durning the briefing. She didn't think it was funny.

You were grateful that she didn't feel like beating your end, but that was probably because she wanted to relax now that the Great Ninja War was over. You heard that Naruto guy, the one that defeated Pain, defeated Madara freaking Uchiha! And that the past four Hokage came back from beyond the grave to help! But more importantly, Madara's dead, again, and no one will live in a fake imaginary world created by a crazy old coot! You made a note to do something nice for the guy when you get the chance.

As for the village, things are looking up now. Ever since the survivors of the war came back, the village's reconstruction has been accelerating, and so far no other village has tried to pull anything funny. Maybe there'll be peace in the Ninja world after all.

But peace for you? Not lately. You've been following a map to Jiraya's hideout, and you came to the conclusion that the old man made this map to drive people insane. The first stop had you dig under the hot springs to find the next piece of the map. When you found it, you weaken the ground underneath a certain Hokage that decided to take some time to relax, and made her fall into your tunnel. To say Lady Tsunade was angry was an understatement. How you aren't in the hospital is something only the Sage of the Six Paths could know. The next couple of stops involved Jiraya's favorite places, more hot springs. Though you might be banned from a good majority of those places, it wasn't all bad. You got to see Tsunade's chest, that has got to count for something. Another stop had you got to this forest where you found this triple bladed scythe that you took a likening to.

You have finally found the place you've been looking for the past two weeks, and you have the hope that you could be in the Hokage's good graces again. The Sage had the place hidden away in a swamp. Seemed fitting enough that he would build the place in an area filled with frogs.
1251.title: Hidden Leaf Village(Naruto)

choices: The Pervy Sage's traps will not deter you!
12511.content:
Mosquitos buzzed around your face as you walked to the building. One landed on the back of your neck and jammed its proboscis into your neck, breaking the skin an beginning its meal. Smack! Your hand made that sound when it made contact with the back of your neck, and the mosquito as well. Another one landed on your face and quickly started its meal of your blood. You brought your hand to it, but the insect got off before you killed it.

The mosquito flew to a near by pond, only to be caught by a tongue of a toad, and to become a snack of the amphibian. The toad then released a loud croak before jumping off the lilly pad it was on.

You continued on your way to the building, swatting any mosquito that attempted to make a meal out of you. You propped yourself on a near by tree to take a break, because it has been that long. You released a large sigh, and took out the map. You looked over it to review your mission. Your first stop, the first sign that this mission was going to be a long one, could of went better than you wanted it to. To see Lady Tsunade so furious, and yet at the same time so arousing was something else, you thought. You don't care how old she is, she's still hot. Now only if you could stop going back to when her chest started to jiggle would help. You started imagine those massive mounds of flesh going up and down on something else, and a scenario where they're jiggling in your face.... You shook your head to being yourself back to reality. Maybe reviewing your other stops, the ones that did not involve naked women, would help you out with tightness in your pants.

This one, you groaned mentally. One of the ones that got you into legal trouble. The second stop had you technically trespass on Hyuga property, and then how you escaped became full trespassing. They didn't even give you time to explain. Thankfully any legal trouble stops were short in number. The best one was the one where you got the scythe. It gives you the feeling that it has been used religiously in more ways than one for some odd reason. There were a lot of deer staring at you with these strange eyes when you dug up the next piece of the map. Yet the feeling that you were trespassing lingered on as left the forest with your prizes.

You took your eyes off the map, and looked up at the sky. "Lord Jiraya, I hope you're watching," you say, thinking the Sage was watching your mission from beyond the grave. "It would only be fitting that you would be a perv in death, as you were in life." You sighed one more time while putting the map away. You killed a mosquito that was having a time with your face. The sooner you got out of this swamp, the sooner you could put this business behind you.

Jiraya's hideout was half size of a two story house, and the years in the swamp hasn't been too bad to it. It looked like it was still in good condition, aside from the grime and filth it gained. You opened the door and felt something fly by near your face. Some blood trickled down your face as you saw what looked like a shurekin hit the tree you previously propped yourself on. You then realized the old man had the place booby trapped, and that might of been a warning shot. You dropped to the ground as more shrukiens hit the tree.
12511.title: Open the door, get on the floor, and duck.

choices: Give to them to Naruto as thanks for his part in the war
125111.content:
As the last shurekin hit the tree, a mosquito flew near the blood on your face and positioned itself to drink your blood. You smacked it, killing it, and leaving a mess on your hand. You were not going to let this stop you. "Lord Jiraya, if your traps kill me, get ready. I'm coming after you!" You yell in a fit of anger resulting from all the dead man has put you through. The swamp became quiet, aside from the croaking of toads and frogs, and the buzzing of insects. You got up and dusted yourself off when your heard what sounded like growling. You turned your head and saw in the hazy swamp fog, a pair of two glowing, piercing, yellow eyes. Eyes that looked at your very soul.

"No. No, no, no..." You say staring straight back at the eyes. "I've been chased by a naked woman that posses strength that can crush a boulder, and have gotten in trouble with the Hyugas. There's no way I'm going to let a genjutsu, or a summoning creature mess with me." You said as you tried to test if this was a genjutsu. No luck. "So, Lord Jiraya has a summoning creature guarding this place," you say as whatever you're giving a look of rage at growls at you more. "But that wouldn't make sense. Shouldn't it be a toad, or a frog?" You ask yourself when you came to a conclusion. "No. Swamp monsters? I am not dealing with swamp monsters." You grabbed a kunai, and pulled an explosive tag out. You threw the kunai with the explosive tag now attached to it at the source of the eyes, and then fired off a fire ball Jutsu at it. It could of been the Jutsu, it could of been the tag, but you could care less. Whatever it was, it was most likely dead. If not, the scythe could finish the job. Just as you were about to enter the building, you say what looked like more eyes appear out of the fog, with intense growling followed afterwards. You then proceed to use the Jutsu once more, firing at all of the eyes.

"Lord Jiraya wasn't good at genjutsu, was he?" You asked as you shut the door behind you. "And if those were his toads, shouldn't they introduced themselves or something?" You shrugged it off as a genjutsu or something. Wanted you wanted to know is if you'd get a vacation after this.

You came across a hallway, and had the feeling that this has to be a trap. You placed your back on the corner, and used the scythe to spring any traps. Sure enough, the scythe did its job. You watched as shurekins flew by hitting the wall. You weren't going to let an old man be death of you when another old man almost trapped the world into a genjutsu.

You found a room that contained scrolls, and felt like you found what you were looking for. You entered the room cautiously, using your scythe as a minesweeper on the floor as you approached a desk. You saw a journal on the desk, and opened it.

"For the past couple of weeks the "growling" has become more frequent than usual, and with increased intensity," you read out loud from the journal, "And what appears to be eyes show up more than they used to." You continued to read from the journal, dismissing this as a trick made by Jiraya. It's better than the other. Swamp monsters aren't real. That's the stuff of legends and folk lore. Things that parents tell their children to stay out of swamps, and for older ninjas to tell genin to make them not leave the comrades behind during swamp missions. Tailed Beasts? A man with unique eyes fighting a god, sealing it inside of him, and creating the moon? That's believable. Especially the latter, because that makes so much sense why there's nine demons made up of chakra. To you at least.

You saw a kunai that the Fourth Hokage used to help him out with that teleportation Jutsu of his on the desk. "This would be a great souvenir," you said putting it in your pocket. You wondered if this counts as stealing, but you decided Jiyara owes you.

Some time had past since you found the room, and it was getting to you. Whatever journal or scroll you found was either old book ideas, or rough drafts. Not that the mission itself was helping as well. You created a clone to take over while you rest up. Every now and then, you would doze off and dream about the hot spring stops before the clone would wake you.

"No, Lady Hokage, not there," you mumbled as you dreamed.

"Wake up, slacker," your clone said knocking you on the head with the scythe's handle.

"My bad," you replied.

"If Lady Tsunade heard you, she'd beat you into next week," the clone replied.

"How is it my fault I'm dreaming about what you're reading?" You asked the clone. "Why are you even reading the old man's smut anyway?"

"Because I'm bored." The clone answered.

You rolled your eyes. "Where are we now?"

"I've just finished reading the story where the guy's girlfriend became an idiot, and the one where this leaf shinobi and hidden mist ANBU black ops operative fall in love. It's actually a pretty good story," the clone answered back.

"How much more do we lack?"

"Twenty five more journals, and fifty seven more scrolls."

"Terrific." You sighed. "Am I going insane?"

"Nah, you're lazy. I'm probably going to go insane here."

"Read smut makes you lose sanity?"

"It's not all smut. Some stories have nothing smutty at all." Insisted the clone.

"Right. Do you think this is all an elaborate test made by the Hokage to see if I'm worthy enough to be a jonin?"

"But why would she let you see her naked then?" The clone asked. "Unless that's a part of her plan I don't see that happening."

"At this point I'm willing to believe anything," you reply. "Note to self, head to home when I get done here. The Hokage can wait."

Several hours, many scrolls and and eleven journals later, the clone and you had read most of the scrolls here, and only one journal was left. Your eyes were tired from reading, and you could really go for hitting one of those hot springs you're still allowed at, and forgetting this mission altogether. The clone wasn't faring much better. The clone leaned to far back in the chair it was sitting in, and with a quick cloud of smoke, it was gone.

"Slacker." You said as you grabbed the last journal.

"I'm getting old," you read out loud, "and I can't always get a young beauty like I could when I was younger. So, I decided what if I could reverse the age process to look and be young again?"

You continued to read the journal and found out that Tsunade's information was wrong. Jiraya didn't just create one experimental Jutsu. He created a couple that only a perverted mind like his could only produce. And one was an age reversal that actually could regress a person's age. A few of them was based on some information he plundered from a base of Orchimaru's. You read that the justu the Sage had created were the following: a mind control Jutsu, two similar Jutsu that could make a woman's chest or butt bigger; one that involved hormones, and one that could turn a woman into a bimbo.

"You got to be kidding me. This has got to be fake," you say to yourself. You read downward on the page and saw that the old man did have some success with these Jutsu. At this point like you said earlier, you're willing to believe anything. You're willing to believe that the journal's telling the truth, and Tsunade's testing your loyalty based on if you use them or not. Heck, you're even willing to believe she wants you to use the bimbo Jutsu on her because she wants to become a brain dead bimbo.

Now what to do with these scrolls?
125111.title: The Pervy Sage's traps will not deter you!

1251111.content:
After all the stuff the Jiyiara has put you through, you're taking the scrolls for yourself. You might even be right about this being a test. You closed the journal and went for the remaining scrolls. Sure enough, they were the experimental Jutsu. You gave them a quick glance over to look at the hand signs. They look relatively easy, but you need more time and rest to fully understand them.

"I could start up my own harem with these Jutsu. I could start up my own clan if I got enough women under my control," you say thinking of the possibilities. You know exactly what you're going to do with the mind control Jutsu. It might help you out with your legal trouble with Hyuga clan and your strained relationship with the Hokage.

Crash!

You heard something breaking down the front door, followed by the same growling from earlier. Whatever it was, it sounded angry. You sighed, and grabbed the scrolls and remaining journals and stuffed them in your pockets. You picked up the scythe, and went out to greet whatever was out there. You figured you had enough chakra to make one more fire ball.

Option 2:
Skip to two months later. You've practiced enough with Jutsu to use them, now test them on Tsunade
1251111.title: Take them for yourself

12511111.content:
Scrape!

You tiredly dragged your new, blood covered scythe across the ground, making that dreadful scraping sound. You saw the village gates, and picked up the pace some. There was five things on your mind to do afterwards. First was take a bath, and get out of your clothes. Second was to get some sleep, and possibly file for a vacation when you wake up. Third thing to do is to get the blood of your scythe and clothes. People are going to think you killed someone. The fourth and fifth thing to do is to get out of trouble with Hyugas, and practice the new Jutsu. Whatever comes first, you're not too picky, but you should probably get out of legal trouble first.

If any kids ask about swamp monsters, you'll tell them an important fact of life. Swamp monsters burn and bleed.

"What happened to you?" Asked a Leaf Chunin guarding the gate.

"My mission," you replied. "Lord Jiyaira is laughing at me in the afterlife."

"What?" The chunin asked. "Have you been in the sun too long?"

"No, I'm just tired." You said passing the chunin. "Lady Hokage, you'll have to wait for me to report back to you." You said walking home.
12511111.title: Return to the Leaf

choices: Go out and find a test subject to use
Time to report to Tsunade, and test them on her.
125111111.content:
With a wide yawn, you woke up in the same clothes you wore yesterday. Seems like you skipped taking a bath, and went straight to bed when you got home. You just rubbed your eyes and took off your forehead protector. "Bath time," you said heading for the shower. A nice, warm shower is what you need. As the water washed over you, its warmth remind you of the hot springs, and seeing Tsunade's chest.

After the shower, you found something to wear and searched for something to eat. You really need to go grocery shopping soon. The milk in the refrigerator is almost spoiled, and the only thing you can eat for breakfast is an almost empty box of cereal. But it'll do for now.

"This smells better than that swamp," you said taking a whiff of the milk. "But then again, almost anything will," you say as you poured the milk into a bowl.

After breakfast, you decided you should now that a better look at those scrolls. A well rested mind should do you wonders to help learn new Jutsu. You placed the scrolls and the journals you brought back on the table, and grabbed the journal that you read the last time. You wanted to make sure of that you didn't miss anything. You didn't miss anything. You went for the remaining journals to see if they had any hints and tips on the jutsu. Most of them were unfortunately just stories Jiraiya didn't go through with. Only two journals had anything on the jutsu, but they'll help. You looked at the scrolls, and saw they were easy, but some required a good amount of chakra to use. The mind control Jutsu gave you the impression that you could use it only once a day. You could probably use it on multiple targets, but that would leave you pretty drained. The age regression one took the most, no question. The bimbo Jutsu would work best together with the mind control, you noted. The expansion Jutsu and the hormone Jutsu required the less amount of chakra.

So, what are you going to do now?
125111111.title: Next day

1251111111.content: Now, who are you going to find to us as a test subject?
1251111111.title: Go out and find a test subject to use

12511111111.content:
You were walking the streets of village in a search for a good test subject. You were being picky on this for some reason. You had to find the "right" one. You took a while looking at this woman that you thought would be a good test subject, but then you bumped into somebody.

"Watch where you're going," you said before you say who you bumped into. You got worried at first, but then you decided you found your test subject. You just bumped into a Hyuga, but not just any Hyuga. You bumped into Hinata Hyuga.

"I'm sorry," she says bowing her head.

"Actually, I think I should apologize," you replied. "I wasn't paying attention myself. I'm Anon," you said introducing yourself.

"I'll be going then. Goodbye, Anon-kun." Hinata says.

"Wait. Before you go, could you help me out... What's your name?" You asked.

"Hinata," she answered.

"Right. You're that girl that helped out Naruto in the war," you said. "I've recently gotten myself into trouble with your clan, and I would be very grateful if you could please help me out."

"What did you do?"

"I was the one that trespassed on your clan's property a couple of weeks ago, but before you say anything, let me explain."

You told her about the mission, and why you had to trespass. Hinata said she would be glad to help you out.

"This takes care of one problem," you thought. "Now if I can convince her to be my guinea pig," you said to yourself.

After Hinata helped you out, you managed to convince her to assist you in testing out your new Jutsu. She wanted to know why you wanted to test the Jutsu at your place. So, you told her that the scrolls are at your house, and you were still having trouble remembering the signs to it.

You brought her back to your place, and was ready to test out a Jutsu. Which one did you go for first?
12511111111.title: Killing two birds with one stone

choices: Nothing at first, but things slowly get hotter.
She jumps you, hungry for what's in between your legs
125111111111.content:
"So, here we are." You said to Hinata as you entered your home.

"*Anon-kun, what kind of Jutsu are these?" Hinata asked.

"They're nothing dangerous," you answered vaguely. "Trust me, they won't kill you."

"That doesn't really answer my question."

"They're experimental Jutsu that revolve around the body and mind, Hinata." You reply.

"Experimental Jutsu? Are you sure about using them?"

"They're easy as making a shadow clone, but some of them do take a considerable amount of chakra. And I honestly think they're fake," you said. "There's nothing to worry about."

"If you say so."

You told Hinata to make herself at home while you went for a scroll. You looked for a scroll, and found the hormone one. "This should be easy," you thought. "Hinata, I found one." You call out. You performed the hand signs, and used the Jutsu on the Hyuga. What happens?

13211.content:
As the Mario series have progressed, time, and Bowser, have proven that Princess Peach is a master at four things. Being in another castle, being kidnaped, getting her kingdom taken over, and then being rescued by Mario (and occasionally Lugi). The toads don't even defend themselves. Her guards coward in fear when Bowser comes knocking. It makes you think that Peach is rather willing, doesn't it? Is Bowser really that good at stealing princesses? Did some witch, demon, or dark god(s) put a curse on her? Does Bowser call in advance to tell he's coming to kidnap her? Point is, it's like anything can kidnap her. Anything.

I'm almost willing to wager that if someone else kidnapped her, besides Bowser or the rare new villain if the big turtle isn't around, there's four outcomes. A) It would disrupt the cosmic balance of the universe. B) Mario and Bowser's reactions would be priceless. C) One of them would fight the other so the loser doesn't get to the princess first. Or D) They would both team up to get their princess back.

This is where you come in. You are a non-toad resident of the Mushroom Kingdom that dabbles in science from time to time, and you're fed up! You're tired of preparing to be ransacked twice a month by a fire breathing turtle with an army. Tired of Princess Peach's failure to keep Bowser out, and the failure that is her leadership. Something has to be done. It's time for a change in leadership.

"I have what I need now," you said putting what you need for your plan. "If Bowser can kidnap the Princess, so can I," you say.

What are you going to use?

"No more worrying about only relying on two plumbers to protect people. No more having to get ready for an army. And no more incompetent leaders."

You could just do what Bowser does, but he has what you don't. The ability to breathe fire, some black magic, and an army. And an undying desire to kidnap the Princess. That's one thing you like about Bowser. He can actually lead, his people doesn't cower when some enemy kingdom comes knocking on the door, and he has determination. But it makes no sense about how he won't give up. Is he really that obsessed with Peach? What does he see in her? He he in love with her? They're not even the same species (you're not entirely sure if Peach is a human, or just another Toad), but you wouldn't judge. If he didn't always bring his boys with him to wreck things up. You have heard that Peach does have some magic powers, so that makes sense. Bowser's a wizard, he'd probably like to make himself stronger. Or is this just something to keep Mario in shape if something worse than Bowser arrives? 132332221.content:
You are Anon the newest fighter in Smash. You are dressed in a brown shirt, pants, a pair of boots, and a wide brim cowboy hat. Your belt buckle has a metal ring in the center. You claim to be a treasure hunter in your own world before you arrived in this world, and you noticed a woman that would be a treasure worth adding to your collection if you could add her to it. Against your better judgement you decided to enter a fight right off the bat to impress her, and you are currently regretting it immensely. As of right now you in a brawl with the leader of the DK crew, Donkey Kong, who is wiping the floor with you.

"Maybe this was not the best idea," you groaned reeling from one of Donkey Kong's punches. The upbeat gorilla did not come to finish you off oddly enough you thought but went after a strange floating orb that made him glow with power. You pulled your trusty ranged weapon out, a Mauser C96, https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c... (think of this but without the shoulder stock) and took aim.

Before you could fire Donkey Kong used his Final Smash and unleashed a fury of pummeling fists on you. You didn't stand a chance and were KO'd just as the time went out leaving Kong to be the victor of the match.

Options for you now:
1: Go explore and mingle with the other fighters.
2: Black out, wake up, and see the woman you were trying to impress standing over you(Reader's Choice on who it is).

Notes: Your gun has three sets of bullets. Regular, bullets that spilt out into nets, and ones that spilt out into grappling hooks. Your melee attacks involve a stun baton.
132332221.title: Would smash

choices: She gives you a moment of rest

1323322212.content:
"Is that all you're capable of?" You heard a posh sounding voice say to you dismissingly. Your eyes opened up to see the lovely Bayonetta looking down upon you with disappointment and some mild amusement in her eyes.

"What happened?"

"Donkey Kong pounded you harder than his bongo drums," she replied. She never was a fan of his drumming yet no one could stop the gorilla when felt the urge to practice.

"He did?" You groaned as she slammed a foot down on your chest, stopping you from getting off the ground.

Your eyes asked her what that was for and she answered with, "Remember our little wager from earlier, Anon?"

"My head still hurts."

"Trying to weasel out of our agreement?"

"Mind giving me a reminder to what I have to do for you?" You sighed. You now remember the deal you made with Bayonetta when you first met her. If you won your match she would have to do something for you, but since you lost you would have to make it worth her while.

"You are going to be my little errand boy at my beck and call until you can defeat me in a match." The witch explained.

1431.content:
I got interested in Homestuck again after Lord knows how long after finding out about Pesterquest/Friendism, and generally listening to the music will I still enjoy to this day. Not too much of a fan of the epilogues or Homestuck2 at the moment. But, enough about that and how I think it will end up being a burning trainwreck. Let's talk about how you'll add the ladies of Homestuck into your harem.

Option #1: The Lord of Heart + a juju: Once upon a time in a universe different from the Trolls and kids' you and a few friends played the game Sburb, and by some odd chance you were among the few in Paradox Space destined for one of the master classes, and your aspect was heart. As the choice title says. As all Lords must endure to progress your personal journey was filled with extreme suffering which required a Herculean effort to overcome. Which you did by the way. Yay you. You are also the only survivor from your session. Through the incredibly questionable and downright reckless choices made in prototyping an especially powerful Black King was waiting for you and your friends at the end, standing between you and The Ultimate Reward. To make a long story short he was an ungodly motherfugger that gave even you, a God Tier Lord of Heart, a mind numbingly difficult time, and it was nothing short of a miracle that you killed him let alone lived to tell the tale.

Six years after entering the universe created by that session you have grown bored, and there's a lust filled hole in your heart only a harem can fill. By a stroke of luck, you come across the Treasure juju John and the MSPA Reader use to gain their zapping around time and space power. You can see where I'm going here.

"But what can a Lord of Heart do?"

We don't have a lot of examples of Lords in canon, let alone a Lord of Heart(emotions/soul/inner self), since the only one being Caliborn/Lord English who is presumably stronger than your "average" Lord due to being a cherub, absorbed the energy of his God Tier clock, and became a fusion of five different people with different classes and aspects. To make this chapter was less wordy just go with this analysis of it
https://god-tier-analyzer.tumblr.com/pos...

TD:R : "-He can manipulate emotions on a cosmic scale, which can range from making people fall in love forever, or causing the most painful heartbreak in the universe, a feeling no one ever wants to feel. He can also manifest his soul into a powerful cosmic weapon, as well as manipulate, steal and destroy others souls."

If you've payed attention long enough for this that's how you're going to enslave them. By manipulation of their hearts and souls.

Option #2: Some other method: Continue going through any other ideas you might have if the first one isn't to your liking.

Option #3: The Wake Up with the harem option: So you don't like the idea of enslaving and just want to wake up with a harem like some dude waking up and being served on butler island.
1431.title: Homestuck(sorry for the walls of text)

14311.content:
As we focus more on one of the many universes created by the game of Sburb we zoom in closer on an earth-like planet populated mostly by Carapacians and Consorts. And located on that planet in one of the more remote areas is a large Victorian style green and dark pink mansion that is empty save for one occupant. Who is it? Why it's you, Anon, the Lord of Heart.

You are currently in the master bedroom, aka your room, dressed in a bathrobe that matches the color of your aspect, in your desk chair using your GIBSONTOP, a laptop that bears the visage of Mel Gibson much like John's Crosbytop did for Bill Crosby. To the right of you is a red cane with a heart ornament on top. It is your HEARTCANE, one of your most powerful weapons, and perfect for someone of your class. You have recently returned from exploring some of the universe created by you and your friends, but whatever you were looking for you were unable to find. What will you do?

Continue to click "refresh" on your favorite website, and hope see if maybe the hiatus of the creator of your favorite webcomic is over. You irritably click on "Refresh" over and over, knowing that the result will be the same as the last attempt. It does occur to you maybe it won't ever get updated considering everyone on your version of Earth died when the meteors came crashing down, but knowing the weird time shenanigans of Paradox Space you still have a little hope.

You lose patience with the site, exiting the tab, and begin contemplating whether or not to watch one of the perverted HAREM ANIMES you have downloaded on your laptop. How you love anime and the idea of being a lord of a harem of beauties dedicated to catering to your every whim and carnal craving. One of your favorite animes was one where the main character started out as a young prince who became king of a war ravaged kingdom, and ended up as a conqueror of the opposing empire full of witches led by an empress who were hot as they were evil. You loved how he put them all in their place as he made them his harem girls. That show helped the six years younger you through puberty, and proved to be therapeutic for stress you gained during the path to godhood.

You decide to hold off on watching anime, you have a far more important task than watching anime at the moment. Figuring out where the flying heck your gang of leprechauns are.

Like all other Lords you gained a group of leprechauns to serve you with powers or own jujus that possess powers based the aspect of the Lord they serve. In your case, Heart, their abilities revolve around emotions, souls, and a one's inner self. Or their items do.

You're not entirely sure where they are, but you have a suspicion they're off getting into fights with the local Carapacians.

While you think about the chess people fighting with your green men you catch the sight of a Prospitian dressed in a mailman's uniform in the corner of your right eye heading towards your humble abode. Looks like it's fairly heavy judging by the the way he's struggling. You probably ought to help him.

The delivery man collapses on the steps of your manor exhausted after days of lugging around parcel. He doesn't even hear you open the door.

"Do I need to sign anything?" You say, receiving no reply. He's out like a light. Wow. This guy busted his back carrying a treasure chest covered in an excessive amount of locks and chains for you, and didn't even get down in time to help him out. You feel like a total dick now.

You bring the chest and mailman inside, putting the latter on a couch in the living room, and then proceeded to cut off the chains with a cutter stored away in the tool room. Once the box was less covered you found a folded note on top of it which might be useful in determining the nature of the contents.

"Dear Boss, we struck gold when you were away. We have no idea what this bad boy can do, but we know a juju when we see one. Signed, Eros." You read off. Eros is one of your leprechauns, and one of the ones you trust the most. This answers one question, but leads to a few more questions in its place like a hydra. A question hydra. You open the chest and against your expectations of something more menacing, you discovered a transparent version of sburb logo emitting a white glow.

Your gut tells you that if you touch this thing you're going to experience a not-so-fun time, but you dismiss it. What's the worse that can happen?

Option #1: You learn not to test fate and zap around points throughout the comic

Option #2: the same as the above but you you meet the first member of your harem after the fifth zapping in

If you have any ideas about the names/abilities of the heart leprechauns let me know. Email me. Don't want any conflict here
14311.title: Lord of Heart: Rise Up

143111.content:
If there is a lesson about touching strange objects of great and unknown power you definitely learned it the hard way. All you remember was a brief moment of pain and flashing light before you're zapped around various unknown places that you've never seen before.

Your first location was above a balcony where man without lips covered in grey paint with fake looking horns, and a white wig wearing a green suit fearfully clutching a wand defensively against the Jolly Green Giant staring him down with a massive golden rifle. If the Jolly Green Giant stopped being jolly, took up the usage of steroids, and had a skull for a face with pool ball eyes. Oh, and a golden peg leg that was doing the same rainbow glow the oversized coat and gun of his were doing. Talk about tacky. Even if you wanted to you cannot save the lipless man from being shot to death by the hulking monster as the same force that brought you here drags you away.

Your next location was a room that is clearly at Derse, Kingdom of Darkness judging by the architecture and the extreme amount of purple all over the place. It probably isn't the one from your session as this place is far too intact compared to the way your Derse was left. You turn your head over the sounds of a struggle to see something that only confuses you more, but answers one question. This definitely isn't at any point in time your Derse. It was easy to deduce that on account of a winged one arm Black Queen dressed in harlequin clothes with a mangled hat, a slashed eye, and tentacles was trying to force a Jack Noir into silly outfits. It actually makes you miss the Jack Noir from your session. Sure he was a stab happy jerk, but he was on the level. Things take a violent turn, you watch the archagent place the murdered monarch's ring on his own finger, and ascend until you're zapped out of here.

You are then taken to more random places after that. From the rooftop on an apartment being used as a training ground for apparently rapping roof ninjas, a jail cell on a Prospit where another Jack Noir was currently bashing the head of an already dead knife ridden burly Prospitian into the the cell door, and then the Skaian battlefield where the Black King from the first session you poofed into commands his army in massive prototyped form. This King actually looks less intimidating than the way yours did with the harlequin clothes and one arm and all. You certainly wouldn't mind taking a crack at another version of him, but it seems a coalition of soldiers from both armies led by a purple cloth wearing Dersite carrying a makeshift red banner march towards the black tyrant want the first crack at him. More power to them. They look like they have an extensive list of grievances with them the King was not prepared for.

But these lists shall be undelivered and unheard as the first Jack Noir you saw in this zapping trip across canon descends from the sky, destroying the King's specter and beheading him in his depowered state. Something tells you this is going to end poorly. Before you're dragged away to another location you see that feeling to be correct. You witness indiscriminate destruction at the hand of Noir, and not even his fellow Dersites are spared from his rampage.

After a while you believe you have learned to control this newfound ability of yours. You close your eyes, and end up in a mostly snow covered forest that is slowly becoming greener as the snow melts. It's still too cold for you given you are still in your bathroom. But thankfully a perk of reaching the god tier is the ability to swap your current outfit for your god tier clothes. That's much better.

You hear the menacing growl of a dog moments from attacking behind you, and guess what? It's that same Jack Noir from earlier. Only this time he lost the hat and tentacles, but became a dog man with green lightning powers? What's with this guy?

Before he can presumably stab you to death with his blade a girl who is at least six years younger than you wearing a green dress that surely can't be suitable for the cold quickly steps in between you and Jack.

"Bad Jack! Bad boy!" She chastises the murderous Carapacian as if he was a disobedient pet. What's hilariously shocking is that it actually works! Noir stands down, his ears lowered as if he was a dog knowing he's in trouble with his owner.

She turns around to face you wearing a relieved expression. She's kinda cute with those green eyes of hers hiding behind her glasses and her long black hair. "Sorry about that. He can be a handful to deal with." She says to you.

Finally a chance to interact with another human being after six long years! You're not going to let this go to waste. Or so you think until you feel that another zapping coming along. You try to stop it, but fail to control this power much to your growing frustration.

No. Hell no! You are the freaking LORD of Heart, act like it and tell this power to fall in line.

Option #1: Fail! Enjoy the continuing trip
Option #2: You successfully zap back to Jade, but an older one with dog ears on a golden battleship
143111.title: Road trip across canon

Your godmother's name is Cietro, she is one of those fairies that have a body like the Tooth Fairy. She wears an outfit like the one Jessica Rabbit wears, but does not have the body of Mrs. Rabbit. Your sister: Her name is Candice. She is a she's a geeky gamer girl nerd. She has c-cup breasts, but has a nice, big fat jiggly butt that she is proud of and likkes it being messed with. She would like a bigger chest, but is okay with her's. She's a bit mild mannered, and has a will to match. She might be smart, but she'd fall under mind control pretty easy. She tries to be a mother figure for the RC, since she's not around, while still being his sister. She is a bit of a sex-postive feminist too, and cannot handle pressure too well. So if the RC had some sort of enslavement pheromones, it would not take long for her to crack. Wears white jeans, and a blue top. To start this off do you want the option where you're a student at Beacon who begins using his semblance on the female students/faculty members before trying your hand at women outside of it? This option will take place before the Fall of Beacon, but you can take some liberties and go about a storyline that is completely different. 2nd option can be anything you want. You could be the kang of all hobos who got into some dust that will give you mind control powers or a magic book for all I care.

Weapon for the Student at Beacon storyline: a halberd with an attached gun that can transform into an ax.

Semblance: Máti kai Filí(Eye and Kiss). Much like how a vampire has the ability to put people under a trance, you too can do this so long as only as it's a woman and she looks into your left eye. To avoid many problems you normally cover the eye with an eyepatch. To seal the deal on your target you must engage in a deep kiss, exchanging your saliva with them. Once that is done, the girl will become fanatically devoted to you while retaining her original personality.
Extras: 1: you can change your target's personality so long as you offer some suggestions before the kiss.
2: It doesn't work instantaneously in some cases. It all depends on how your target feels about you beforehand, how strong their will is, and their current state. One kiss will not work on Weiss, Blake, Glynda, or Cinder for example.

Got it?

New changes

152332221.title: RWBY it is (UPDATED)x2

1523322211.content:
Your name was Anon, one of the many first year students at Beacon Academy, one of the four main institutions to train Huntsman and Huntresses to fight the forces of evil. Grimm continue to attack the kingdoms on all sides and it’s up to people like you to face off against them.

That’s what you tell yourself each day, but things have not been going well.

You were a decent fighter. Better than that Jaune Arc kid, but compared to some of the others, you were subpar. Pyrrha Nikos, the champion, wiped the floor with you in less than a minute. You always seemed to just miss with your halberd. Even the youngest student, Ruby Rose, could easily handle you. it didn’t help that your team was a mess. During the breach, two of your team fell in battle. The third one was brought home by her parents, so you were left alone. Ozpin, the headmaster, assured that as long as you kept training, when a spot opened on another team, you would join.

Things were looking bad.

Until you developed your Semblance.

You didn’t realize it at first, but one of your eyes changed colors after you wore a patch on it for a week. When someone looking into it, they seemed to be mesmerized. You tried giving people orders or suggestions, but the second you broke contact, they didn’t seem to remember any of it. Until you found out by accident it needs to be sealed with a kiss. Like a contract. That meant you weren’t going to use it on any guys. Also people with strong willpower took time. He couldn’t turn someone like the assistant headmistress Glynda Goodwitch without multiple applications.

Maybe this was the start to change your life? You could get some of the hottest girls in Beacon to fall for you or maybe get them to help you out with training. You had so many possibilities available to you. Anyways, you were traveling the hallways alone. The day was nice and most people were outside enjoying the weather. You rounded a corner and smacked right into someone else.

That person was…
1523322211.title: Student at Beacon

15233222111.content:
Ruby Rose, the scythe wielding leader of team RWBY and the winner of a sparring match you were recently in. That semblance of hers is something you have yet to effectively counter.

"Ow ow," whined Ruby still on the ground.

You extend a hand to the shorter girl to pull her off the ground and she accepts.

"Oh, it's you, Anon," she says once she regains her bearings. "Sorry about that."

"It's fine really." You replied. "I wasn't looking. Only one useable eye to look out of." You point to where your eyepatch ought to be.

She tills her head quizzically and looks into your eyes. Both of them look fine to her what are you talking about? Especially the left one which is very hard to not look at in Ruby's mind. It's just so entrancing and making her light headed. She can't turn away.

It just occurred to you that you can see the out of both your eyes, and all you see now is a Ruby Rose who's silver eyes are dulled and seems completely out of touch of the world around her save for you. Great.

Just great. You kneel down to pick up your eyepatch off the ground where you discovered it had been cut, and somehow stayed on long enough before Ruby bumped into you. It must have happened during your training session, and how Crescent Rose managed to only cut your eyepatch is nothing short of luck. You take a good look at Ruby, really studying her. who is remains enthralled by you even if it was accidental.

Ruby is at least a year or two younger than you. You can see the resemblance to her older sister Yang, a girl with a body you cannot deny in good faith your desire to explore for yourself, but it's not entirely there. Ruby and Yang must be only half-sisters and you can only guess which parent is the one they share. She's still cute to you. Maybe she can be a cute guinea pig for you too. After all learning the limits of your semblance is something you've been curious about lately.

"Hey, Ruby," you say as you move a finger in front of her face to see if her heavy eyes will follow. Then don't by the way.

"Yes?" She slowly asks in a monotone voice, sounding more like a mindless drone than someone with free will.

"Why don't we go back to my room? I mean, if you're free at the moment."

"I have time to spare," said your test subject of questionable willingness.

The two of you leave the hallway before anyone else can get an eyeful the way Ruby did to prevent any possible headaches. And you debate over which path to take with Ruby. The trance's strength varies from person to person right down to how they feel about you and how strong their will is. You wouldn't say Ruby is weak willed, but it's obvious she's a simple soul which isn't a bad thing of course. And judging on from what you've seen she's sort of socially awkward which may or may not help you in the long run. But you will certainly keep it in mind when figuring out what you can and can't do with Ruby.

Maybe some suggestive conditioning will be a good start with her. Or you could figure out just how devoted Ruby will be to you if you go full force with the final part of your semblance. Share a few minutes long French kiss full of saliva exchanging with her. You can always put her under a trance again if you feel like changing her personality.

Option #1: Go easy and try giving her suggestions
Option #2: Go full force and ensnare her
15233222111.title: Ruby

152332221111.content:
You pause for a moment to plot out how you want to go about this. You are fairly green with your semblance so there is not a lot you can do with Ruby until you become more practiced with it. Something simple will work easy for Ruby. Something that won't fry her brain on accident, or push pass her limits.

"Ruby," you say to the girl under your trance, "Whenever you see me you'll become really flustered."

"Why?"

"Because you have a crush on me," you explain to the slightly younger girl.

"I do? I don't-"

"You do. Trust me," you insistingly say, pushing your power into her mind.

"I have a crush on you." Ruby repeats emotionlessly.

Excellent.

You give Ruby a quick kiss, giving her enough of your saliva to ensure the conditioning takes hold.
152332221111.title: Maybe try conditioning her

1523322211112.content:
The rest of the previous day was largely uneventful after a very flustered Ruby left your room as a cloud of rose petals. You chalked up your conditioning attempt as a success, and her sudden exit as her social awkwardness mixing up with it. It was honestly very cute to see her face turn a bright red. In your mind Ruby presumably isn't used to those kind of feelings yet, but given time and more conditioning you can help her out with the feelings you put inside her.

It was currently near the end of the lunch period and you had put away your tray when you spotted Ruby heading in your direction accompanied by her busty blonde sister Yang by her. When Ruby noticed you she stops in her tracks while blush from yesterday made a return across her face. Yang quizzically looks at her little sister, wondering what caused Ruby to start acting like a nervous schoolgirl seeing her crush. Sure enough she moved her head, and her eyes landed directly on you.

Yang examines you before letting off a small grin and whispering something in Ruby's ear that caused her to look more embarrassed. You wonder how this is going to play out.

15233222111124.title: Something Else

152332221112.content:
You are normally not an impetuous person, but your curiosity over what effect a long kiss will do to someone entranced by your eye. Why go through a tedious process where you'll have to slowly influence Ruby over time you tell yourself. Especially when she is in your room right now, and you can cut to the chase with just one salvia swapping session. Not worrying about anyone catching you having a mind control session with her out in the middle of a hallway or room is also something you can avoid as well. Forget being labeled as a creep or being expelled from Beacon if that happens. What Ruby's older sister will do to you makes fighting a Nevermore barehanded seem more preferable.

"Hey, Ruby," you say to the mostly unwilling guest to your room.

"Yes?"

Before you reply to her you take another good look at her. You are more into girls with bigger curves like Yang or Goodwitch, but Ruby's body isn't necessarily unattractive. Maybe in a few years she'll develop more similarly into Yang's body type.

It does occur to you that you are about to throw a Beowulf sized wrench into this girl's life if you go through with this. You have talked to Ruby before a few times. All she aspires to be in life is a huntress, and here you are moments away from potentially turning her into a slave. Your slave. Will you even stop at her? Will you turn your mesmerizing gaze on her friends and teammates?

Wait a minute. There's no need for you to be mulling over this. Just create yourself a battle-harem full of huntresses. Maintaining world peace and casting down the forces of evil by day, servicing you by night. Yes. Hell motherfugging yes. And with one sexy and awesome thought you just got rid of all your fomenting internal conflict. Pat yourself on the back.

However. you probably need to be more strategic about this, and plan ahead. Start your harem out small. Four to five girls. The rest of Team RWBY will do just fine. And you especially need to be careful in regards of certain activities. Getting your girls pregnant while you're still a student at Beacon is a very stupid idea. Angry parents and Professor Ozpin will presumably not enjoy your explanation as to why their daughters and his faculty members are now pregnant, kicked out of school, and calling you "Master." You want kids but you also want to get your Huntsman license. You also want to avoid birth control pills. You've recently read an article about how those things end up messing with women's hormones quite negatively.

You'll think of something when you cross that bridge.

"Have you ever kissed a guy before? No, giving your dad a peck on the cheek doesn't count."

"No. These lips have never made contact with anyone else's before." She answers.

"Well, that's about to change. I'm going to give you a nice-" as you say that Ruby starts to shake meaning you found something she's going to be uncomfortable with. Nice going doing this with a socially awkward girl.

You give Ruby an eyeful and attempt to reassure the enthralled girl she has nothing to worry about. The both of you will enjoy this. You probably ought take it slow with her just to be safe.

Ruby trembles as her lips pucker up and you take your time to press your own upon hers. So far so good. Your tongue creeps out and passes through into her mouth, the shaking intensifies some. As your salvia begins to enter her mouth you finally find her tongue. Might as well make this special for her.

The minute your tongues wrap around the others the scythe wielding girl shakes hard enough you start to worry this is going to end very poorly for you. Goodbye Beacon and hello Yang's fists.

You try to break the kiss, but to your surprise Ruby pulls you back in. You heard a cute little moan out of her too. She's enjoying it more than you imagined.

You mentally chuckle. By the time you're done Ruby Rose is going to be all yours. Heart, body and soul. She probably is at this point. The two of you break apart for a breather, and her eyes slowly regain their color. You turn around to get a spare eyepatch to cover your eye. You're out of aura now so no more hypno sessions until you grow stronger at using your semblance. Ruby still has that out of it look, and you wonder if you fried her brain.

That prospect flew out of the window upon you asking her about the mechanics of Crescent Rose, and Ruby returns to her usual self when weapons are involved. You're going to love spending the rest of your life with this girl.

Option #1: Talk with your new devoted slave. Give her the reason why your room is so barebones and why you're team-less. Or go play video games with her. Whatever comes first.
Option #2: It sure would be bad if someone barraged into your room after looking for Ruby and saw her enter your room. Especially since if you can't use your semblance on them now. But you're a smart guy right? You can totally talk your way out of this hypothetical situation, right?
152332221112.title: The Rose is Yours and Yours alone

1523322211121.content:
"So, Ruby," you begin to say, "If I told you to start calling me "Master" when we're alone would you do it?"

"Uh, sure, Master," she replies.

Well this appears to be a good start.

"I'm going to need your help with two things, Ruby. First thing: help me out on finding certain girls to use my semblance on."

She tilts her head quizzically. "Why would you want to do that, Master? What does your semblance do exactly?"

"I call it "Máti kai Filí". It's why I need these eyepatches on," you point to the eyepatch you're currently wearing. "Anyone who sees my left eye is placed under a hypnotized state where I can give them little suggestions that affect their personalities if I so choose to."

"Your semblance is mind control? Not really much of a good guy ability, but still kinda cool." Said Ruby.

"Trust me. I wish it was regular hypnosis and not this. Getting used to these patches drove me crazy," you grumbled. "But that's not all it does." You finish explaining to your slave how you can make your target devoted to you if you can place some of your saliva into their mouth, and how it really depends on the strength of their will power and how they feel about you beforehand. Ruby can see why you preferred regular mind control over all that work now.

She also doesn't show any particular signs of enjoying the prospect of joining you on this endeavor; however, what choice does she have now that she's devoted to you? Ruby might still be Ruby but she will follow you anywhere now. You tell her since she is the first member of your soon to be expanding harem she gets to be the head girl which confuses her to a degree.

"You'll be to me what Professor Goodwitch is to Professor Ozpin. You get it now?"

"Now I get it." She coughs before doing her best Goodwitch impression she can manage getting a laugh out of you. Not too bad you tell her.

"Second thing I need help with. Mind helping me out?" You asked. "If I don't improve my skills I won't be able to stay at Beacon."

"Shouldn't you ask your team about this?" Come to think of it your dorm seems to posses more than enough space to suit more than a mere one person. All that's in here are a few beds, books, and just you. Really activates her almonds when she thinks about it more. "You do have a team right, Master?"

Your mood turns quite dour, and you fall over onto a nearby bed. "I lost two of them in that crazy breach. Grimm just started pouring out on the streets, and it's an absolute miracle we had our weapons with us. Not that it helped all that much. We got overrun, and two of us went down before Professor Port and Professor Goodwitch bailed out what was left us." You explained, the hopeless battle replaying in vivid detail all over again.

Ruby brings you back into reality, expressing her condolences and apologizes for asking about topic you hate thinking about. You sigh and finish your tale. "The parents of my surviving teammate and friend came by and took him back home. As you can see, Team A isn't really effective when there's only one person as the "A"."

"Haven't you tried getting into a new team, Master?"

"I've tried, but there aren't many openings at the moment. I can get moved to a team if I impress Professor Ozpin enough though. So there's that." You rise off the bed with a less down in the dumps look. "I just want to know what happened that day, you know? It really feels like someone was behind it." You turn to her, and it almost looks like Ruby knows more about the breach than you think. Maybe she and her gang got trapped in that too?

Ruby starts telling you of how her went on a trip with Oobleck a few days ago, ending up in a fight with the militant faunus group called the White Fang and a criminal named Torchwick who they've been dealing with for a some time now. While her story is certainly fascinating you were going to stop and ask in the middle of what this had to do with your predicament. Until Ruby placed the blame for the breach upon the Fang and Torchwick. That got you really interested and really in the mood for some payback. She then tells you last saw Torchwick being taken into custody. Time for you to get more creative.

"Say, this Torchwick guy didn't happen to have any girls as cute as you hanging around him did he?" You ask with some evil intent in your visible eye.

"There was that one," Ruby says, trying to remember the name of Roman's sidekick that aided him during one bout they had. "I think he called her "Neo".

"Neo, huh? Can't wait to meet her." You lost two of your friends because this guy did so you're going to take his Neo. Ruby advised you to be cautious in that regards. Something about this Neo girl gave Yang a hard time during that train brawl. That will require some more planning out now that you think about it.

Revenge plots aside what will you do now?
Option 1: Do something nice for Ruby since she's the first member of your harem. Might as well since you're now stuck with her
Option #2: Skip to the next day

choices: Go about the rest of your day
15233222111212.content:
You do not remember if anything important happened after you sent Ruby away. You doubt it. You probably passed out on your bed because going full throttle on Ruby needed a huge chunk of your aura. In fact, you would bet money on it given how miserable you were upon waking up. Lousy semblance. You made a mental note as you hastily dressed yourself this morning to take it easier with any potential targets of yours in the future.

But for now, you are writing down anything you deem important from Professor Goodwitch's mouth on your notebook as the lecture continues. It's not that difficult anymore since you read books on becoming a better note taker. At least you think so.

You definitely will not try your hand at using your semblance on the instructor any time soon. Glynda might be very attractive for her age, but you prefer not receiving the boot out of Beacon. Still, the idea of using her riding crop on her one day is quite tantalizing.

You used your uncovered eye to look around the room and it landed on the first member of your harem. Busy writing down her own notes like a good student Ruby fails to notice your attention. You wonder if she has any ideas on who to use your eye on next, or if she'll leave that in your purview. Most likely she will. You do not believe Ruby has a knack for that. You do however believe today might be a good day for you to hone your skills through a training session with her. Taking notes in class does not help in thinning the horde of grimm in the world.

You divert your eye to the individual next to Ruby, a girl with an air of elegance you find very alluring. Even the scarred left eye of Weiss Schnee adds to her charm. You don't really know too much about Weiss herself beyond the fact she's the granddaughter of the founder of the SDC, Nicholas Schnee, and she's a talented student at this academy. You are curious about who Weiss really is, and what kind of possibilities your touch can have with her. The Schnee Dust Company's website provided you very little information on her when you did a report on her grandfather for one of your classes. You swear a company as wealthy as her family's could clearly afford better website designers too.

"Ahem." Your thoughts regarding Weiss and poor website designs are interrupted by an expecting Goodwitch who noticed you may have stopped paying attention to the lecture. "Mr. Anon, could you possibly tell the class what the semblance of the most notorious war criminal of the Great War was?" She asked, putting you on the spot.

"Uh, well," you mutter trying to remember the answer without looking at your notes. "His semblance allowed him to create wings out of his aura?" You answered unsure.

"Correct."

For the rest of the class you paid attention on her lecture and focused less on what you're going to do afterwards. Which by the way, your time here is done. What will you do now?

Since I apparently now have an upgraded account there will be five options.
Option #1: go practice with Ruby. You need it.
Option #2: Try your hand at Weiss
Option #3: Option #2 but something or someone gets in your way
Option #4: Go do your own thing. Enjoy your day.
Option #5: Reader's choice

choices: Take some risks and go bigger.

15233222112.content:
“Ouch!” You knocked a girl down and immediately scrambled to your feet. Not realizing your eyepatch slipped off.

“I’m sorry!” You apologized really fast and reached a hand down to help her out. The black hair, amber eyes, and bow told you that it was Blake Belladonna. One of the top girls in the year and an absolute stunner.
https://images.app.goo.gl/y11X8fAS3EwAEb...

“I’m fine,” Blake said, dusting herself off. “I wasn’t watching where I was going either.”

You notice her book was on the ground and picked it up, reading the cover.

“Ninjas of Love?” You asked.

“Give that back!” She quickly yanked it out of your hands, cheeks turning pink.

“What volume are you on?”” You asked.

“You saw…. What?” She blinked in surprise. “You read it too?”

“Yeah,” you admit, though your face felt warm and you scratched your cheek. “I read the first one for a dare and just liked the series, so I kept at it.”

“I’ve read them all,” Blake admitted. “I’m just rereading.” She looked up and her eyes met yours. She looked excited and then they started to dull. “Your… eyepatch…”

Crap!

You realized it fell off when you crashed into her and not that your eyes met, she was going into a trance. Well, you wanted to try it out anyways, so now was the time. The thing was, Blake was pretty strong willed, or so you guessed. It was going to take time, so maybe you should be careful to just start conditioning her. Make her slowly gain feelings for you. Of course, the more risk, the more reward.
15233222112.title: Blake

choices: You wander around Beacon a bit more.
You see Blake the next day.
152332221122.content:
“Blake, can you hear me?” You asked, making sure to maintain eye contact. You prayed no one else would show up and interrupt everything.

“Yeeesss.” Blake murmured in a monotone.

“Now, you like Ninja’s of Love, right?”

“Yeeeess.”

“And you like having someone else appreciate it too, right?”

“Yeeesss.”

“How many other people do you know that likes it?” You asked.

“No one…”

“I see. So having someone like it is rare.”

“Yes.” Her words weren’t drawn out, but her tone was the same.

“Rare can mean special, right?”

“Sometimes.”

“This is one of those times,” You tell her. “In fact, it’s so rare, you can’t stop thinking about me.”

“Can’t stop… thinking about you?”

“Correct. You want to talk to people who share interests like me. Whenever you daydream or are bored, you’re going to think of me.”

“Whenever bored, will think of you.”

“Yes, think of me.” You pressed on. It was important to keep him in her thoughts to weaken any resistance. “Every day, you think of me.”

“Every day I think of you.” Blake repeated.

“At night, you might even have erotic dreams.” You pushed. This was a risk.

“At night… I’ll have… what?” her tone started to gain a little of her own personality back.

“Relax,” You tell her and you saw her shoulders slack a little. “it’s only natural to imagine Ninja of Love scenes. They are such wonderfully written. The adult parts make the story.”

“Of course.” She agreed.

“It’s just, when you imagine those scenes, you will imagine yourself in there.” You carefully say. “It’s only right to imagine the guy as someone who appreciates the story.”

“Guy has to… appreciate the story.” Blake repeated.

“And I’m the only guy you know that likes Ninjas of Love.”

“You are.” She slowly nodded.

“So it makes sense to imagine us acting out those scenes.”

“It makes sense.” Blake agreed.

“Every time you have one of those dreams, you will feel horny,” You continue. “This horniness will come back anytime you see me. When you see me, you remember those dreams.”

“I’ll get horny when I have those dreams,” Blake stated. “Seeing you will cause me to remember those dreams and feelings.”

“Very good.” You tell her. “Now, after I kiss you and walk away, you will wake up and not remember consciously anything except that I like Ninjas of Love and we talked about it for a little bit. All my suggestions will stay.”

“I will only remember us talking about Ninjas of Love.” Blake muttered. ”But all of your suggestions will stay.”

“Good girl.” You leaned forward and pressed your lips against hers. They parted slightly and you pushed your tongue in, careful to add some of your drool into her mouth. She tasted good and you regretted break contact. You left and didn’t see her snap out of the trance and looking confused.
152332221122.title: Take some risks and go bigger.
